title: Wario, Master of disguise

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Disguise as**: Disguise a player's cause of death to a role of your choice if they die.
- **Masquerade**: Instantly give a copy of your attribute to a Koopa, it lasts for this night and the next one.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You may appear to be a role of your choice to all investigative effects. You may change the role you appear as at any time.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who would oppose Lord Bowser.

desc:
Post 2512
*Master thief, the silent, but deadly Purple Wind.*
